author: kfogel
msg: * fs-test.c (get_file_digest): Check for end of stream more carefully,
to avoid a final, empty read.

author: cmpilato
msg: Woohoo!  A huge chunk of DAV property goodness!  We should now have
working properties for files and directories in checkout, import,
svn_ra_dav__get_one_prop): Removed ras argument, added sess
svn_ra_dav__get_one_prop): Removed ras argument, added sess
All callers changed to pass their RA session's ->sess item, except
those in fetch.c:start_element() and end_element(), which pass ->sess2.
modified to match new calling discipline.
(start_element): Fetch file and dir props during an update replaces.
(end_element): Fetch file and dir props during an update adds.
(get_repos_path): New helper function.  This is kinda hack-y, and
(close_helper): Send <S:fetch-props/> to instruct the client to
fetch all the existing props, or <S:remove-prop name="(name)"> to
instruct the client to remove a no-longer-existing prop.  I doubt
(upd_change_xxx_prop): Add changed props to the changed_props array,
removed props to the removed_props array.

author: sussman
msg: Begin work on 'svn cp' and 'svn mv'.  Just saving work at this point.
[New .c files added; be sure to re-run autogen.sh to detect them.]
* libsvn_client/copy.c (svn_client_copy):  new file, new dummy func.

author: xela
msg: first draft of a native implementation
